description: FAKE A CALL is a simple but powerful and customizable Palm WebOS application used to fake a cellular phone call.  Features include: Customize the caller's name and phone number; Fully functional fake Answer Call Button & End Call; Fully functional snooze call; Choose from a selection of built-in ringtones; Set delay times for calls - Snooze; choose from a selection of fake caller voices; Interface mimics the Palm Pre and Pixie handsets.  Product Roadmap: Choose from a selection of wallpapers; Choose from a selection of caller photos; Play ringtones samples on the preference screen; Change the caller's voice to male or female; Choose from a selection of caller messages.
